verses.verse: מִזְמ֗וֹר <S%H4210><s%> miz-Mor, A Psalm לְאָ֫סָ֥ף <S%H623><s%> le-'A-Saf of Asaph אֱ‍ ֽלֹהִ֡ים <S%H430><s%> 'elo-Him O God בָּ֤אוּ <S%H935><s%> Ba-'u are come גוֹיִ֨ם׀ <S%H1471><s%> go-Yim the heathen בְּֽנַחֲלָתֶ֗ךָ <S%H5159><s%> be-na-cha-la-Te-cha, into thine inheritance טִ֭מְּאוּ <S%H2930><s%> Tim-me-'u have they defiled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הֵיכַ֣ל <S%H1964><s%> hei-Chal temple קָדְשֶׁ֑ךָ <S%H6944><s%> kod-She-cha thy holy שָׂ֖מוּ <S%H7760><s%> Sa-mu they have laid אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְרוּשָׁלִַ֣ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim Jerusalem לְעִיִּֽים׃ <S%H5856><s%> le-'i-Yim. on heaps

נָֽתְנ֡וּ <S%H5414><s%> na-te-Nu have they given אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- נִבְלַ֬ת <S%H5038><s%> niv-Lat The dead bodies עֲבָדֶ֗יךָ <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dei-cha, of thy servants מַ֭אֲכָל <S%H3978><s%> Ma-'a-chol [to be] meat לְע֣וֹף <S%H5775><s%> le-'of unto the fowls הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim; of the heaven בְּשַׂ֥ר <S%H1320><s%> be-Sar the flesh חֲ֝סִידֶ֗יךָ <S%H2623><s%> cha-si-Dei-cha, of thy saints לְחַיְתוֹ־ <S%H2416><s%> le-chay-tov- unto the beasts אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> 'A-retz. of the earth

שָׁפְכ֬וּ <S%H8210><s%> sha-fe-Chu have they shed דָמָ֨ם׀ <S%H1818><s%> da-Mam Their blood כַּמַּ֗יִם <S%H4325><s%> kam-Ma-yim, like water סְֽבִ֘יב֤וֹת <S%H5439><s%> se-Vi-Vot round about יְֽרוּשָׁלִָ֗ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim, Jerusalem וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> ve-'Ein and there קוֹבֵֽר׃ <S%H6912><s%> ko-Ver. and [there was] none to bury

הָיִ֣ינוּ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yi-nu have חֶ֭רְפָּה <S%H2781><s%> Cher-pah We are become a reproach לִשְׁכֵנֵ֑ינוּ <S%H7934><s%> lish-che-Nei-nu; to our neighbours לַ֥עַג <S%H3933><s%> La-'ag a scorn וָ֝קֶ֗לֶס <S%H7047><s%> va-Ke-les, and derision לִסְבִיבוֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H5439><s%> lis-vi-vo-Tei-nu. to them that are round about

עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- long מָ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> mah How יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh Jehovah תֶּאֱנַ֣ף <S%H599><s%> te-'e-Naf be angry לָנֶ֑צַח <S%H5331><s%> la-Ne-tzach; alway תִּבְעַ֥ר <S%H1197><s%> tiv-'Ar burn כְּמוֹ־ <S%H3644><s%> ke-mov- like אֵ֝֗שׁ <S%H784><s%> 'Esh, burning קִנְאָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H7068><s%> kin-'a-Te-cha. envy

שְׁפֹ֤ךְ <S%H8210><s%> she-Foch Pour out חֲמָתְךָ֨ <S%H2534><s%> cha-ma-te-Cha thy wrath אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- upon הַגּוֹיִם֮ <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim upon the heathen אֲשֶׁ֪ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not יְדָ֫ע֥וּךָ <S%H3045><s%> ye-Da-'U-cha that have not known וְעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al and upon מַמְלָכ֑וֹת <S%H4467><s%> mam-la-Chot; thee and upon the kingdoms אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בְּ֝שִׁמְךָ֗ <S%H8034><s%> be-shim-cha, upon thy name לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo not קָרָֽאוּ׃ <S%H7121><s%> ka-Ra-'u. that have not called

כִּ֭י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אָכַ֣ל <S%H398><s%> 'a-Chal For they have devoured אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko; Jacob וְֽאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et נָוֵ֥הוּ <S%H5116><s%> na-Ve-hu his dwelling place הֵשַֽׁמּוּ׃ <S%H8074><s%> he-Sham-mu. and laid waste אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- nay תִּזְכָּר־ <S%H2142><s%> tiz-kor- burn

לָנוּ֮ la-Nu עֲוֹנֹ֪ת <S%H5771><s%> 'a-vo-Not iniquities רִאשֹׁ֫נִ֥ים <S%H7223><s%> ri-Sho-Nim not against us former מַ֭הֵר <S%H4118><s%> Ma-her speedily יְקַדְּמ֣וּנוּ <S%H6923><s%> ye-kad-de-Mu-nu prevent רַחֲמֶ֑יךָ <S%H7356><s%> ra-cha-Mei-cha; let thy tender mercies כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> ki for דַלּ֣וֹנוּ <S%H1809><s%> dal-Lo-nu low מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od. very

עָזְרֵ֤נוּ׀ <S%H5826><s%> 'a-ze-Re-nu Help אֱלֹ֘הֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> 'e-Lo-Hei us O God יִשְׁעֵ֗נוּ <S%H3468><s%> yish-'E-nu, of our salvation עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and דְּבַ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> de-Var for כְּבֽוֹד־ <S%H3519><s%> ke-Vod- the glory שְׁמֶ֑ךָ <S%H8034><s%> she-Me-cha; of thy name וְהַצִּילֵ֥נוּ <S%H5337><s%> ve-hatz-tzi-Le-nu and deliver וְכַפֵּ֥ר <S%H3722><s%> ve-chap-Per us and purge away עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and חַ֝טֹּאתֵ֗ינוּ <S%H2403><s%> chat-to-Tei-nu, our sins לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an sake שְׁמֶֽךָ׃ <S%H8034><s%> she-Me-cha. for thy name's

לָ֤מָּה׀ <S%H4100><s%> Lam-mah Why יֹאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> yo-me-Ru say הַגּוֹיִם֮ <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim Wherefore should the heathen אַיֵּ֪ה <S%H346><s%> 'ai-Yeh Where אֱ‍ ֽלֹהֵ֫יהֶ֥ם <S%H430><s%> 'elo-Hei-Hem angels יִוָּדַ֣ע <S%H3045><s%> yiv-va-Da' acknowledge; בַּגִּיִּים bag-gi-yim כבַּגֹּויִ֣ם <S%H1471><s%> bag-go-Yim the nations קלְעֵינֵ֑ינוּ <S%H5869><s%> le-'ei-Nei-nu; in our sight נִ֝קְמַ֗ת <S%H5360><s%> nik-Mat, [by] the revenging דַּֽם־ <S%H1818><s%> dam- of the blood עֲבָדֶ֥יךָ <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dei-cha of thy servants הַשָּׁפֽוּךְ׃ <S%H8210><s%> hash-sha-Fuch. [which is] shed

תָּ֤ב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> ta-Vo come לְפָנֶיךָ֮ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-nei-Cha before אֶנְקַ֪ת <S%H603><s%> 'en-Kat Let the sighing אָ֫סִ֥יר <S%H616><s%> 'a-Sir prisoner כְּגֹ֥דֶל <S%H1433><s%> ke-Go-del thee according to the greatness זְרוֹעֲךָ֑ <S%H2220><s%> ze-ro-'a-Cha; of thy power ה֝וֹתֵ֗ר <S%H3498><s%> ho-Ter, preserve בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei thou those that are appointed תְמוּתָֽה׃ <S%H8546><s%> te-mu-Tah. to die

וְהָ֘שֵׁ֤ב <S%H7725><s%> ve-Ha-Shev And render לִשְׁכֵנֵ֣ינוּ <S%H7934><s%> lish-che-Nei-nu unto our neighbours שִׁ֭בְעָתַיִם <S%H7659><s%> ve-'a-ta-yim sevenfold אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- into חֵיקָ֑ם <S%H2436><s%> chei-Kam; into their bosom חֶרְפָּ֘תָ֤ם <S%H2781><s%> cher-Pa-Tam their reproach אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which חֵרְפ֣וּךָ <S%H2778><s%> che-re-Fu-cha wherewith they have reproached אֲדֹנָֽי׃ <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai. thee O Lord

וַאֲנַ֤חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> va-'a-Nach-nu we עַמְּךָ֨׀ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-me-Cha So we thy people וְצֹ֥אן <S%H6629><s%> ve-Tzon and sheep מַרְעִיתֶךָ֮ <S%H4830><s%> mar-'i-te-Cha of thy pasture נ֤וֹדֶ֥ה <S%H3034><s%> no-Deh will give thee thanks לְּךָ֗ le-Cha, לְע֫וֹלָ֥ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam for ever לְדֹ֥ר <S%H1755><s%> le-Dor to all וָדֹ֑ר <S%H1755><s%> va-Dor; generations נְ֝סַפֵּ֗ר <S%H5608><s%> ne-sap-Per, we will shew forth תְּהִלָּתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H8416><s%> te-hil-la-Te-cha. thy praise
